H0.text: In which European city was the 1968 Eurovision Song Contest held. Paris

H1.text: In which European city was the 1968 Eurovision Song Contest held. Amsterdam

H2.text: In which European city was the 1968 Eurovision Song Contest held. Stockholm

H3.text: In which European city was the 1968 Eurovision Song Contest held. GBLON

A4.text: The contest was held on 6 April 1968 at the Royal Albert Hall in London

A5.text: The contest has been held annually since 1956 (except for 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic)
